short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sync wallets every 10 mins to force new transaction notifications on the mobile app within minutes of them happening.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keep the CoinTracker.io Wallets page in a pinned (or regular) tab for the extension to run 24/7. The extension will automatically click the "Sync Wallets" button after 1 minute, then reload the page after 9 more minutes (to re-enable the Sync Wallets button), so your wallets will sync every 10 minutes. Keep push notifications on in the mobile app's settings so you'll be notified of new transactions.
